thread.title_full: 'Skin Tight' Star, 24, Drops 220 Pounds But Feels 'Disgusting' Due to Loose Skin: Watch the Sneak Peek

title: 'Skin Tight' Star, 24, Drops 220 Pounds But Feels 'Disgusting' Due to Loose Skin: Watch the Sneak Peek
text:
Nicole Kidman Explains Her Awkward Oscars Seal Clap 
Ashley says that immediately following the weight-loss procedure, she had renewed energy and was more excited to socialize than she had ever been before. But her mood quickly shifted. "I was loving my active social life, but I began to withdraw as soon as I started noticing the skin â€” it was sagging all over my body," she says. "Looking at my skin, I feel like a deflated balloon. I feel shriveled up. I feel disgusting." Celebrity Health Scares 
Watch the clip above. Skin Tight airs on TLC Wednesdays at 10 p.m. ET.
